name: Schoolgirls Craft
description:
You are in a small secluded town, in which the only Craft School in the world was built! It teaches the creation of blocks and teaches the basics of building beautiful houses with a unique interior.Explore the school, meet with classmates and other students, look into the finished classrooms or create your study room, whether it's the office of floristry, architecture, gardening, etc. Travel the game world with a steep generation of biomes, gather resources, explore caves and mines, create weapons and armor or new blocks.

Features:
- Mode of exploration with survival (blocks, craft) and creative.
- A large set of 3D models of interior and decoration (furniture, appliances, etc.).
- Sandbox with a diverse generation of the world.
- Exterior decoration design (lamps, flowers, gardens, pools, benches).
- Mode of designing and building houses.
- Manufacture of items and armor.
- Colorful pixel texture.
- Updated city + School.
